EmailTemplate.name: Draft Agreement Task Escalation
EmailTemplate.subject: Draft Agreement Task Completed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
"Dear {!Booking__c.OwnerFullName},
The client has cleared 10% payment for {!Booking__c.Unit_Number__c} in {!Booking__c.Project_Name_Formulla__c}, please initiate the registration process and share the draft AFS with the client.
Thankyou. Dynamix
